title: Limit partners list to exactly 5 entries

requirements.text: In the Partners component, ensure the static partners data array contains exactly 5 partner entries. Remove any partner entries beyond the 5th so that no more than 5 partner cards are ever rendered on the page.

quotes: only 5 partner is there. Not more than 5 partner

acceptanceCriteria: The Partners section displays exactly 5 partner cards — no more, no less.
No sixth or additional partner card is visible on the page.
All 5 displayed partner cards show correct names, designations, and details.

requirements.text: If the backend partner data (fetched via useGetPartners) returns more than 5 partners, cap the rendered list to the first 5 entries on the frontend so the UI never shows more than 5 partners regardless of backend data.

quotes: only 5 partner is there. Not more than 5 partner

acceptanceCriteria: When backend returns more than 5 partners, only the first 5 are rendered.
The partners section never shows more than 5 cards under any data condition.

constraints: Do not change any partner details (names, designations, specializations) — only remove entries beyond the 5th.
The About section stat '5 partners' must remain consistent with the displayed count.
nonGoals: Adding new partners or modifying existing partner profile information.
Changing the visual design or layout of the Partners section.
Backend schema or data model changes.
